name: KLEIN TOOLS 861914 Skribes Fine Tip Permanent Markers, Assorted Colors, Hard Hat Clip, Multi-Surface Jobsite Marker for Wet, Dry and Oily Surfaces, 4-Pack
short_description: 4-PACK ASSORTED FINE TIP PERMANENT MARKERS: Klein Skribes Markers feature high-quality, long-lasting ink with clog-resistant tips, ensuring reliable marking on any jobsite
INDUSTRIAL GRADE PERFORMANCE: Fine tips jobsite markers write effortlessly on wet, oily, dusty, and abrasive surfaces, ensuring clear markings on OBS, wood, concrete, metal, plastic, and more
EXTENDED CAP-OFF LIFE: 72-Hour protection against drying out ensures your markers stay vibrant and your marks remain visible
ANTI-ROLL DESIGN: Triangular-shaped barrel prevents markers from rolling away, keeping them within reach and ready to use
HARD HAT CLIP: Easily attach markers to hard hats or use the lanyard loop for quick access and convenient carry
product_description: Klein's Skribes Fine Tip Multi-Color Permanent Markers available in red, blue, black and green permanent ink. Feature durable tips that create clear, long-lasting lines for markings and labeling on jobsite materials. Resists clogging and has professional grade ink that writes effortlessly in the toughest conditions: wet, dry, oily and on abrasive surfaces. The anti-roll triangular shape and integrated hard hat clip keeps the writing utensil accessible and within reach on the job. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn't just the name of our company, it's also our family name. And since we're an American company that's family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn't just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day ... Since 1857.

name: Permanent Markers Ultra Fine Tip, 30 Pack Black Quick-Drying and Fade-Resistant Permanent Markers Bulk Set for Writing and Drawing on Wood, Plastic, Metal, Glass, Ideal for Office School Supplies
short_description: Big Value Pack: Includes 30 black permanent markers in one practical, easy-to-access pack. Whether you’re stocking up for a classroom, office, art studio, or shipping department, this bulk set ensures you’ll always have reliable markers on hand—no last-minute shortages, no interrupted workflow.

Ultra Fine for Precise Detail: Equipped with a 0.4mm ultra fine tip, this marker delivers crisp, controlled lines—ideal for writing in small spaces, outlining, and adding intricate details. Great for labeling, journaling, technical drawing, and detailed work on paper, plastic, metal, and more.

Quick-Dry, No Smudge: The fast-drying ink formula helps prevent smudging, smearing, and ink transfer—even when writing quickly or handling items immediately after marking. A dependable choice for both left-handed users and busy environments where speed and clarity matter.

Waterproof & Fade-Resistant: Permanent ink is built to last—resistant to water, fading, and daily wear. Whether you’re marking storage boxes, tools, folders, or shipping labels, your writing stays clear and intact through handling, time, and exposure.

Safe & Reliable Design:Made with non-toxic, low-odor ink that meets safety standards for school and office use. Safe enough for classrooms and shared workspaces, yet professional enough for warehouses, labs, and creative studios. Durable, comfortable, and built for extended daily use.

name: BIC Intensity Black Permanent Markers, Ultra Fine Point, 12-Count Pack of Black Markers With Non-Slip Grip for Comfort and Control
short_description: One 12-count pack of BIC Intensity Ultra Fine Black Permanent Markers
Long lasting black permanent markers with an ultra fine point size
Ultra fine tip markers feature a unique snap cap with vapor seal mechanism to help keep the tip from drying out
Black bulk markers have an ultra-fine point for creating detailed, precise lines
Black markers with a soft, non-slip grip ensure comfortable handling and added control, helping you unleash your creativity with confidence
product_description: Make your ideas and artistic creations come to life with BIC Intensity Black Permanent Markers. These permanent markers have a durable, ultra-fine point to create crisp, precise marks — the ideal black markers for detailed writing and drawing. BIC Intensity Black Permanent Markers are long lasting with a soft, non-slip grip offering comfort and enhanced control, while the unique snap cap with vapor seal locking mechanism helps prevent dry-out. Capable of marking on a wide variety of surfaces, including glass, metal, plastic and photos, these ultra fine point markers use acid-free*, quick-drying ink to create bold, long-lasting and colorful lines without smearing. Looking for low-odor permanent markers that are perfect for office or school supplies? Non-toxic, ACMI-approved BIC markers are ideal for use at work, school or home, and they’re a great choice for brainstorming sessions, art projects, chore charts and more. This pack contains 12 black permanent markers letting you unleash your creativity. Feel prepared and confident for your next classroom lesson with BIC Intensity Black Permanent Markers. *No added acid; no measurable pH.
